reviews.customers_say: Customers find this kaftan comfortable in the heat and appreciate its generous fit with room to spare.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softer than a pricier option
items.body: Bought two of these along with one from Miss Lavish London, which are pricier. I actually like these better, as the fabric has a softer hand. I just bought 3 more! They’re cool, comfortable, lightweight, swishy, colorful, feminine, dry quickly and take up very little closet space - perfect for puttering around the house/work from home. Not embarrassed to answer the door in them. Never thought I’d be a caftan wearer (calls to mind Mrs. Roper and my extremely heavy aunt) - but I’m a convert! They’re pretty enough and opaque enough that you could wear them in public. Much nicer imo than yoga pants, and that’s been my go-to casual wear over sweats. Based on other reviews, I was concerned about puckered stitching at the neckline and popping seams with normal use, but I’ve lolled in a hammock and sat in bed with them on with no issues. Being 5’4” and 165 lbs, I was concerned the hem might drag on the ground or be so enormous the sleeves would catch handles and drape into the dishwater while washing up. The hem just brushes the tops of my feet and sleeves aren’t in the way while doing light housework. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: D. Eccles

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable and pretty
items.body: I haven't washed this yet and it does say to launder it alone, due to the dyeying process. That said, the garment is attractive and comfortable. I wear this around the house when it's hot because it's loose. Another option is that this will make a good travel robe. Thin, easy to pack and perfect cover up to go to the pool, lounge in hotel room, etc. Read more
items.author: NG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very lovely.
items.body: This is a lovely garment. Have worn it outside walking the dog. Received many compliments. Will be excellent for the summer days and warm nights. Also fab in the house as well. Generous fit and comfortable. Excellent buy!! Read more
items.author: Della Mac

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars comfortable can be dressed up or down
items.author: carole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Regal Comfort: The Perfect Lounge Wear for Queens!
items.body: Great quality Kaftan! I bought two for my mother, and she looks like a queen in them. They are perfect for lounging around while writing, cozy on a cold day, and they look fantastic. The length is ideal for a tall woman, and with the design, I think most of the colors will look wonderful. I definitely plan to buy more in the future Read more
items.author: Mrbillium

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but Rips easy.
items.body: Pretty design, lots of compliments by ladies, BUT be warned… it rips easy… I have only worn it 1 time, bought for a Friend’s destination event that called for “Kaftan dress attire” the leg area seam opening & the fabric ripped all the way up to my thighs first time on the tour bus, good thing I wore black capri leggings underneath! Fun event, good thing I was with my close friends or it could have been embarrassing LOL Read more
items.author: Alex Morales

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection!!!
items.body: I love this. I purchased three more, different styles. I don't wear them as they are styled, I wear them around the house for comfort, to the bus stop etc . . . I always get lots of praise from anyone who sees me. I highly recommend this product and I will be ordering more. Read more
items.author: Sunshine smiles

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Comfort!
items.body: I am an elderly woman and this is my first year wearing kaftans. I love the comfort they bring. They are cool and I feel great wearing them. Gypsy Blue, is one of my favorite brands, the fit perfectly. I will buy more for sure. ♥️ Read more
items.author: grandma

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cream Geometric Print Caftan, Pink Floral, Black Floral, Red Paisley, Red Animal, Multicolor One Size Maxi Caftan, Black, White Floral, Black Flower, Multi-color, Multicolor Floral, Golden Yellow, Black & Rust, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
